section.title: Time Clock Summary
section.para: To view a summary of Time Clock for Employees, select the "Time Clock Summary" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Production Time Clock by Work Order

section.para: You can post Employee time from the Time Clock Summary.

note.para: Click the MORE button to display more filtering options.

listitem.para: Enter the date for the beginning of the date range you want as a filter in the report.
Enter the last date of the date range you want to use as a filter
Displays Item Number automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Display lists users who have clocked-in to the specified Work Order. If the totals row displays in red, this means the sum of total setup and run times does not equal the total effort.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: All the time for the selected employee will be posted. Time not associated to a Work Order will be posted to the labor overhead account.
All unposted time displayed will be posted.
You can edit unposted time form an Employee. The following screen will appear when you click the EDIT button when a specific time entry is selected:
To reverse time, highlight the entry you wish to reverse and click the REVERSE BUTTON.
Select a time entry to change and click the EDIT button. You will be presented where you can change the start and end times for the entry:
The selected Employee will be displayed
The type of labor will be displayed. Time not associated with a Work Order is overhead.
Change the date and/or time of the time entry for the selected Employee.
In this field you can change the end date and/or time that was initially entered.
The number of hours that have been calculated previously is displayed.
The number of hours that have been calculated after the specified time in the Shift will be displayed.
